net.hudup.data

Class DocumentVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.Profile
      • net.hudup.data.DocumentVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.hudup.core.parser.TextParsable

    public class DocumentVector
extends net.hudup.core.data.Profile
    This class represents a document vector. SMTP measure in this class is developed by Yung-Shen Lin, Jung-Yi Jiang, Shie-Jue Lee, and implemented by Loc Nguyen.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • smtp

        public double smtp(DocumentVector other,
                   double lambda,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vars)
        Computing SMTP measure with other document. SMTP measure is developed by Yung-Shen Lin, Jung-Yi Jiang, Shie-Jue Lee, and implemented by Loc Nguyen.
        Parameters:
        other - other document.
        lambda - lambda.
        vars - variances.
        Returns:
        SMTP measure with other document.

        Parameters:

        vars - variances.

        SMTP measure with other document vector.
